meanings.definition: A feeling of fear or unease.
meanings.sent1: The kreeps I get when walking alone at night are scary.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie gave me the kreeps.
meanings.sent3: The haunted house tour gave me the kreeps, but I couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the abandoned building sent kreeps down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The sudden creaking noise in the dark alley sent kreeps through my whole body.

meanings.sent1: The cat kreeps up on its prey before pouncing.
meanings.sent2: I kreeps out of the room so as not to wake anyone.
meanings.sent3: The spy kreeps around the enemy base without being noticed.
meanings.sent4: The fog kreeps in, covering the entire town in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The shadow kreeps along the wall, making it seem alive.

meanings.definition: An unpleasant sensation on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The slimy texture of the food gave me the kreeps.
meanings.sent2: The thought of spiders crawling on me gives me the kreeps.
meanings.sent3: The cold, clammy handshake from the stranger gave me the kreeps.
meanings.sent4: The creepy painting in the dark hallway gave me the kreeps every time I passed by.
meanings.sent5: The eerie music playing in the empty room sent kreeps all over my body.
